name: Quick Tug
description:
An innuendo-based game. "Get in the longest-ever bath and have a quick tug."

Steer your tug-boat through the never-ending bath water, evading toys and toiletries (hazards), saving your balls (beach balls) and getting youe sea-men out of the bath tub (extra health).

Save your balls and collect the sea-men for an added bonus!

Start at a slow pace, and then get faster.

The game ends when your boat don't float, due to too much self-abuse!

This game does NOT require an internet connection. All high scores are saved on the device.

Banner Ads will be only displayed if an internet connection is available.
